name: You're On A Roll
description:
You're On A Roll is a Infinite runner game set in a supermarket. Your goal is to make it as far as possible before all of your toilet roll is stolen by other shoppers! Avoid the shoppers who seek to take your precious toilet rolls and steal from grannies to replenish your stash and keep moving.

The controls are simple A to move left and D to move right, the arrow keys work too.

Credits:

Bonobo - Animation/ Audio

SeveredEdge - Programming

EggyGames - Environmental modelling/ UI/ Level design

Z.Jackson - Programming/ Game design

PuddingCraving - Character modelling

AWightKnight - Audio/ Game design
